gw.plugin.exchangerate

Interface IFXRatePlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IFXRatePlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    The FXRatePlugin encapsulates the business rules for obtaining Foreign Exchange [FX] rates between currencies
